divs: sighting detailsstood in garden looking at shooting stars and milky way with wife .it was a clear night and we have no light p0llution in area as at the adge of big city . my wife spotted objects first ,there were a group of between 8\10 units in first group with one following behind . they went from west to east over us at some speed but with no noise and did not alter the flying positon at all. the objects were shapped like big birds gliding with wings out but there was a very there was a very short part pointing out from the front . they glowed a orange glow almost like a street light does . there speed was some what faster the a passenger jet i would guess possbly 5;6 times faster . and guessing by height i would say at least 10 times larger than a say passenger jet . i am more than happy to go on a lie detector to proove what we both saw with out a doubt awsome site to see .
Summary: ORANGE GLOWING BIRD LIKE SHAPES FAST AND VERY BIG
trends: There has been one other sighting in Hereford
